sentences.english: This question is much bigger than that.
sentences.chinese: 這個問題比那要寬廣的多。

sentences.english: He's always taken a musically broad perpective.
sentences.chinese: 他總是採用一種非常寬廣的音樂空間。

sentences.english: That change is then carried into the wider world.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的改變將會訴諸於更寬廣的世界。

sentences.english: Singing on a broad range of men and women with cohomology cavity, cavity with male falsetto.
sentences.chinese: 唱法上音域寬廣，男女同腔同調，男腔用假聲。

sentences.english: His range is very dynamic and wide.
sentences.chinese: 他的音域不斷變化，而且十分寬廣。

sentences.english: Back and loin are broad and strongly coupled with some tuck-up.
sentences.chinese: 背部和腰部寬廣有力，線條稍微向上延伸。

sentences.english: And the Lads have ocean-like minds.
Less prejudice makes your life expansive.
I love thee to the depth and breath and height my soul can reach.
sentences.chinese: 我愛你，盡我的心靈所能觸及的深邃，寬廣和高遠。

sentences.english: Travel broadens our eyes and enlarges our mind.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊使我們開闊視野，心胸寬廣。

sentences.english: The cylinder's speed-control range is wide, when the flow advancing 30% of flow.
sentences.chinese: 高流量時增大30%流量，氣缸速度控制更寬廣。

sentences.english: It has a degree of openness and precision that is only matched by the best solid-core cables.
sentences.chinese: 此線材豐富寬廣及精確，只有好的線材才能相提並論。

sentences.english: It's not so impregnable or wide as the Soviet one.
sentences.chinese: 它不像蘇聯的那個那麼堅固寬廣。

sentences.english: With great wisdom and broad bosom.
sentences.chinese: 依憑博大的智慧和寬廣的胸懷。

sentences.english: The horizon of life is broadened chiefly by the enlargement of the heart.
sentences.chinese: 生活的視埜主要是隨著心胸的開闊而變得寬廣的。

definition: one's bosom (the seat of emotions)/breast/broad-minded and open/to think about/to cherish
to break new ground (for agriculture)/to open up (a new seam)/to develop (border regions)/fig. to open up (new horizons)
